website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you want an Akoya pearl necklace for about half the price of the Pearl Source strand, though the quality is not as good.
pros: AAA-grade Akoya pearl necklace at a mid-range price
Single-knotted stringing keeps the pearls in place
cons: More pearls have blemishes than expected for AAA grade, and the luster does not appear as good as the Pearl Source pearls

customer_reviews.title: La Regis pearl strand a good value
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 7.5-8 mm 18" necklace for 399. We are no experts on pearls, but thought the white color, luster, matching, and size of the pearls were exceptional at this price. (We had to request a certificate of authenticity directly from the company, which they sent promptly as a printable email. The presentation box was fine for gifting.)
customer_reviews.author: oldgreyent

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular piece of Jewellry
customer_reviews.text: This pearl necklace is as magnificent and stunning as you can imagine. It is timeless, classy, elegant, classical piece of Jewelry with high luster and iridescence of the pearls .The pearls are uniformed and delightfully round.I could not detect any visible flaws with naked eye. The clasp is so pretty albeit a bit technical to figure out.This necklace comes with a beautiful satin case to store it in and a certificate of Authenticity.Simply breathtaking!
customer_reviews.author: T.Chase

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't writer reviewed, but I bought this necklace based other reviews. I do not not think the pearls is AAA quality as they claimed, there is a lot of of scratches and flaw on the pearls. I paid around 400 dollars and expected more. The necklace look decent and the size of the pearls are accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Hason Vu

customer_reviews.title: I am no expert in Pearls. I ordered this ...
customer_reviews.text: I am no expert in Pearls. I ordered this necklace and one similarly described costing $100 less. I returned the cheaper one and kept these - if you are giving your wife a necklace and you have to look at it, these are pearls I am proud to have given - worth the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Omansky

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves these
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this necklace. I bought it as a surprise for Christmas. She is stunning with the necklace on. Quality of the pearls is superb, and they are well matched. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: James Percy

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite
customer_reviews.text: I would describe the appearance of these pearls as being exquisite. I have worn this necklace almost every day since its arrival. I would be remiss if I did not mention how I have noticed several of my acquaintances glancing at it with pure admiration. Please know that the packaging of this product is staged for the finest presentation (e.g., Gift-boxed that included a beautiful ribbon). Although I am quite pleased with my purchase, I am as equally disappointed that I did not receive a certificate of authenticity since I deem this to be an investment.
customer_reviews.author: mlfcarter

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the necklace! My wife love it so much! Very good quality and it comes with a cute nice box!
customer_reviews.author: bill rose

customer_reviews.title: Better then Kay's, Zales or any other mall jewler.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful 8.5 mm white(nice pink hue)pearls. Much higher quality then I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Leamy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice necklace
customer_reviews.text: Almost the same as in the picture, very nice necklace. I am not an expert on pearls but I find these were better over several local stores, not to mention that the price is much lower. It feels strange to order jewelry on line without seeing it, but these pearls worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase, very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Everything came nicely packaged, color is a nice rich color. The wife will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Leif

customer_reviews.title: I got this beautiful pearl formy mom and she loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this beautiful pearl formy mom and she loves it. The color and the size are just right. It's a very good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Shooshan

customer_reviews.title: Akoya pearl necklace
customer_reviews.text: Love....Love...Love them! Really pretty strand necklace. It was my Mothers day gift from my husband, but he had me do the research to find who I wanted to order from, I checked lots of reviews and decided to go through this company. I am glad I did because the pearls are beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Julie Y Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Company!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Working with this company has been fantastic. Aron did everything he could to make sure that I was satisfied with my order and his help was incredible. I would recommend this company to anyone and the product was fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: William C. Marriott

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case. Pearls appear as good as advertised. Overall I'm satisfied. I may purchase a longer necklace. My wife loves pearls
customer_reviews.author: Hugorene

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pearls
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas. She loves them and they look great on her! I originally bought some freshwater pearls and they looked terrible so I ordered these when they were a lightning deal. These are a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: msp0088

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pearls...but
customer_reviews.text: It's overall a beautiful strand of pearls. I'm very happy with the size, color, and lustre. However, I wish it came with a certificate or something stating the size and quality of the pearls from the company. I'm not sure how it's classified as AAA quality because I still see rough and uneven surface on some of the pearls or is it just this strand of pearls I got. I'm not a pearl expert so I don't know if that's natural occurrence on pearls of AAA quality.
customer_reviews.author: Vlo

customer_reviews.title: Akoya White Pearl Necklace
customer_reviews.text: This strand is a classic: just the right size, well-matched with inner glowing luster without being flashy. I could not see any flaws without a magnifying glass and, best of all, the wife loved the pearls. The necklace is everything I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: zWizard

customer_reviews.title: Classic Necklace
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely piece of classic jewelry. It was more striking than the description. The packaging was an added plus. It was very nice to have such an attractive gift box with which to present the necklace. The product exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful Christmas Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of jewelry! I would easily recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Service Par Excellence
customer_reviews.text: This is an exquisite piece of jewellery to my daughter’s collection of pearls. Vera did an outstanding job of exceeding expectations and adding to the lustre.
customer_reviews.author: Munir Iqbal

product_meta.title: 14k Gold Handpicked AAA White Japanese Akoya Cultured Pearl Necklace, 18"
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :February 10, 2020
 * Manufacturer :La Regis Jewelry
 * ASIN :B084P3MD49

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #2,104,673 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #372 inWomen's Pearl Strand Necklaces 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars25 ratings
feature_bullets: THE PERFECT CULTURED 14 WHITE GOLD AKOYA PEARL NECKLACE – Akoya pearls add class to every outfit from casual to dressy. This 18 inch necklace is the perfect choice for that special day.
VIRTUALLY FLAWLESS – Akoya cultured pearls are renowned for their lustrous shine and thick nacre. Each pearl is hand selected and meticulously inspected.

SOLID 14K Gold: Our pearl necklace is finished with a fishhook clasp crafted of 14K yellow Gold. Perfect for sensitive skin; Lead and Nickel free. La Regis Jewelry has the Top and Best Akoya cultured stud Pearl Earrings Jewelry Gift In A Box. Perfect Present For: Wife, Girlfriend, Fiancee Mom, Daughter, Niece, Grandma or Any Precious Women Your Life. Suitable For Birthday, Wedding Gift, Mother's Day, Valentine's Day, Anniversary, Christmas and the Holidays Seasons or Wedding Jewelry.
DIRECTLY from THE SOURCE: We import our pearls directly from the pearl farms and assemble them in the USA

THE PEARL EXPERTS – As a founding member of the Cultured Pearl Association of America (CPAA), La Regis Jewelry helped create the standards for today’s pearls. Each order includes a Certificate of Authenticity that guarantees the source and quality of the pearl.
